title: life and passion of christ
description: depicting well-known incidents in the life of jesus christ, this milestone of early cinema won world fame, huge audiences and a screen life of decades when most secular films of the time measured their commercial life in weeks.

title: the lady athlete; or, jiu jitsu downs the footpads
description: women pursue pickpockets from piccadilly to hampstead and wrestle them.

title: el grito de dolores o la independencia de méxico
faust
description: twenty-two songs from the opera faust, presented in twenty-two reels, each about three minutes in duration. images were synchronized with a recorded soundtracks using the chronophone sound-on-disc system.
